welcome_message_body: Welcome to Yuci, China! Get ready to explore the charm and history of this ancient city, known for its traditional architecture and rich cultural heritage. We hope you enjoy your time here and make the most of all the experiences Yuci has to offer.

restaurants.name: 好伦哥Origus
restaurants.description: 好伦哥Origus is a bbq joint located in the city.

restaurants.address: 安宁街印象城, 晋中市, 山西
